annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Neymar sends a precise lofted cross into the box. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot which hits the bottom of the left post and bounces in off it. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 0:1.
